numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a pattern in sports leagues.
2. In most sports, most players are players of color.
3. Major League Baseball is an exception.
4. In basketball, people of color dominate among players.
5. In basketball, the ratio of players of color to white players is about 4 to 1 for women and for men.
6. In Major League Baseball, the players are almost equally divided between players of color and white players.
7. In Major League Baseball, the ratio of white players to players of color is about 3 to 2.
8. In every poll, the percentage of head coaches of color is significantly lower than the percentage of players of color.
9. In the National Football League, 74 percent of players are players of color.
10. In the National Football League, 13 percent of head coaches are head coaches of color.
11. I wonder why this difference exists.
12. In Major League Baseball, the percentage of head coaches of color is 20 percentage points lower than the percentage of players of color.
13. In Major League Soccer, the percentage of head coaches of color is 20 percentage points lower than the percentage of players of color.
14. This difference is smaller than the difference in the National Football League.
15. In the Women's National Basketball Association, the percentage difference between coaches of color and players of color is about 50 percentage points.
16. In the Men's National Basketball Association, the percentage difference between coaches of color and players of color is about 50 percentage points.
17. People of color are less likely to be a head coach in a major sports league than white people.
18. This situation has an impact on the community around us.
19. This situation shows that people of color and white people have different opportunities to be in power.
20. The headline is: Player of Colors vs. Head Coaches of Color in different major sports leagues.
